task:
Explore Ably dashboard to discover API endpoints:
1. Use navigate action to go to https://ably.com/accounts
2. Wait 3 seconds for dashboard to load
3. Click on the first available app/project in the list
4. Wait 3 seconds for app details to load
5. Look for and click on 'API Keys' or 'Keys' tab/link
6. Wait 2 seconds
7. Look for and click on 'Queues' tab/link if available
8. Wait 2 seconds
9. Look for and click on 'Integrations' or 'Rules' tab/link if available
10. Wait 2 seconds
11. Look for and click on 'Stats' or 'Analytics' or 'Usage' tab/link
12. Wait 2 seconds
13. Scroll down to see more content
14. Look for and click on 'Settings' tab/link if available
15. Wait 2 seconds
16. Use done action
